mapper.sql: month, time_vehicle, time_gps, short_vehicle, short_gps, long_vehicle, long_gps
mapper.insert: insert into gps_overview (month, time_vehicle, time_gps, short_vehicle, short_gps, long_vehicle, long_gps) values (#{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeVehicle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeGps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortVehicle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortGps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longVehicle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longGps,jdbcType=INTEGER})

month,

mapper.update:
update gps_overview
time_vehicle = #{timeVehicle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time_gps = #{timeGps,jdbcType=INTEGER},
short_vehicle = #{shortVehicle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
short_gps = #{shortGps,jdbcType=INTEGER},
long_vehicle = #{longVehicle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
long_gps = #{longGps,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
